name: Nature s Secrets Turmeric Hand Wash
description: Turmeric hand wash effectively cleanses to kill germs for clean, fresh hands. This new improved formula is extra effective at removing food odours, leaving hands refreshingly scented. Enriched with natural turmeric extract, powerful moisturizers and a skin-friendly pH, this cleanser is extra gentle on skin, keeping your family’s hands soft and protected. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
